p: During analgesic activity test: Forty experimental animals were randomly clustered into eight groups as follows: group I, group II, group III (A-B), group IV, group V, group VI, and group VII consisting of five mice in every group. Every cluster received a selected treatment. Before any treatment commenced, every experimental animal was weighed properly and the doses of the test samples and control materials were adjusted accordingly. Mice of each group was marked as M-1=Mice 1, M-2=Mice 2, M-3=Mice 3, M-4=Mice 4 and M-5=Mice 5 (Sarkar et al., 2016).
